transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hi sir. Meri ye Shri ji Trader company me baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Hi sir, Vishal baat kar raha hu mai IndiaMART head office se. Good afternoon, good evening sir, kaise hai aap?
Customer: Badhiya hu sir.
Executive: Just abhi aapka hamare paas ek concern receive hua hai sir, wo buylead ke related.
Customer: Haan sir, sir dekho mujhe koi problem nahi hai sir IndiaMART chal raha hai sab kuch hai. Bas mujhe sir yahi problem hai thodi si ke mujhe lead 50 milni chahiye sir. Bas mujhe yahi problem hai otherwise mujhe kisi se koi matlab nahi hai na kisi se kuch lena dena hai.
Executive: Mai waise na aapke case pe hi baat kar raha tha. Aapki Ilma ji se baat hui thi. Correct sir, ek baat suno suno suno suno. Sir mere do dost hai abhi mai unke yaha pe job kar raha tha sir.
Customer: Dekho sir.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To unhone mera account khulwaya hai. To unki firm pata nahi kis naam se hai kya hai warna wo bhi bata deta hu mai. Hai to un logo ko mili hai 50-50 lead. Unhone pehle samjhaya tha.
Executive: Sir, sir mujhe bas ek cheez puchna hai aapse. Ek ek minute bas mujhe agar aap time de. Sorry maine interrupt kiya aapko beech me. Mai ye puch raha tha aap mujhe bata sakte hai kinone aapko ye commit kiya tha buylead ka?
Customer: Sir actually aapke kisi employee ne nahi kiya tha mujhe.
Executive: Achcha aapko kisi ne commit nahi kiya tha?
Customer: Nahi, nahi kiya sir.
Executive: Then sir agar kisi ne commit nahi kiya fir aap aap shayad unhone aapne bola tha ki Mr. Rohit ji ne aapko commit kiya hai?
Customer: Nahi to sir aisa kuch nahi hai sir.
Executive: Aapko to fir aap mere se ye buylead kyu keh rahe the kyuki aapne yaha par likha bhi hua hai aapne jab feedback diya tha application pe aapne usme likha hua tha Mr. Rohit ji ne aapko buylead ka commitment kiya tha.
Customer: Nahi kiye the sir unhone.
Executive: Unhone nahi kiya hai?
Customer: Nahi, nahi.
Executive: Then kisi ne aapko commit koi kuch buylead nahi kari thi ki 50 buylead hum dilwa denge aapko?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi.
Executive: Sir, sir aaj se kam se kam ho gaye aath nau mahine pehle balki jyada time ho gaya ek saal ho gayi wo to pata nahi. Sir, Sayyed hai aapke yaha par koi kaam karte hai?
Customer: Sir.
Executive: Aath se nau mahine pehle?
Customer: Matlab ek saal ho gayi hogi at least mujhe confirm nahi hai waise ek saal ho gayi hogi. Ek saal pehle jab mera jab pehle account tha to sir unme unhone jab mere dost ka chal raha tha to unhone na hum kya hai likhit pe diya tha Sayyed hai koi IndiaMART me.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Pura naam kya hai sir unka number hoga contact number aapke paas?
Executive: Nahi, nahi mujhe mujhe nahi pata mere paas nahi tha dost dost ke paas tha to par log matlab kuch bhi tha aise hi kuch tha. Hai to na jab 50 lead mili thi par ab dekho aapke kisi employee ne mere se nahi kaha personally.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Abhi kisi ne aapko personally nahi bola. Sir agar kisi ne aapko personally nahi bola sir fir aap humse kyu demand kar rahe hai 50 buylead ke sir?
Customer: Sir kyuki mere do teen dost hai unko mili hai.
Executive: Aapke do teen dost ko mili hai sir?
Customer: Haan to unhone ye bola hai IndiaMART me complaint karo 96 wale toll free pe to wo log dilwayenge.
Executive: Unhone aapko ye bola aap 96 pe call kar do to ye dilwa denge sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir, sir mai aapko ek cheez keh sakta hu sir dekho IndiaMART pe na sir dekho hum service aapko provide karte hai.
Customer: Sir ye to mujhe sabne samjhaya hai.
Executive: Aap bhi samjhiyega sir aap please sir sab service wagera provide karte hai uske bare me batate ho agar koi problem hai to uske bare me solution dikhate ho ye sab cheeze. Ye to mujhe sab pata hai sir kyuki maine bhi kaam kiya hai isme dosto ke through dosto ka par mujhe to pata hai. Bas dekho sir mujhe sirf itni si problem hai mujhe dekho lead dilwa do bas aap.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: But sir jo aap mujhe keh rahe hai na sir dekho dekho aapko payment lete time service ek commit kari gayi thi jo hum service aapko denge sir. Correct. Hum wohi service aapki fulfill karte hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Hai jo jis cheez ki hum aapse payment lete hai sir. Aapko sari cheeze payment lene se pehle bhi inform kiya jata hai ki kis cheez ki hum aapse payment le rahe hai sir. Ab sochiye sir us time pe aapne hame ye sari cheeze accept karke payment karwai sir. Correct. Ab aap mujhe keh rahe hai ki sir 50 buylead sir sir hamare paas seriously agar aisa option hota na hum aapko provide karne ke liye mana nahi karte sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Aap samjhiye kyuki kabhi kisi person ne aapko commit bhi nahi kiya agar koi commit karta hai kyuki dekho hum IndiaMART me agar work kar rahe hai.
Customer: Sir sunai nahi de raha sir. Aawaz aap fir dobara se repeat karna sir.
Executive: Mai keh raha tha ki agar IndiaMART pe aapko kisi ne commit nahi kiya na kehne ka matlab koi commit kar bhi nahi sakta hai is cheez ke liye kyuki kisi ke paas right bhi nahi hota ye provide karne ka sir. Ab baat samjhiye agar hota to wo aapko pehle bhi de chuke hote service provide karte time hi wo aapko bol dete ki sir mai aapko ye bhi extra de sakta hu sir. Sir jo cheez nahi hoti hai na iske liye koi commit nahi karta sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Aap samjhiye sir otherwise hum aapko thodi na mana karte aapko jo service ke humne bola hai payment lene se pehle ki hum ye service aapko denge is isme ye ye benefit hum aapko denge.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants 50 buyleads.

- Friends received 50 buyleads.



Resolution:

- Explained no such commitment was made.

- Explained services provided as per payment.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, commitment, service, payment

seller_categories.mcat_name: Personal Vibrators and Massagers for Women
